H0.text: Circulatory is the body system that processes foods into a usable source of energy.

H1.text: Digestive system is the body system that processes foods into a useable source of energy.

H2.text: The nervous system processes foods into a useable source of energy.

H3.text: Skeletal system processes foods into a usable source of energy.

A4.text: Digestion involves the breakdown of food into smaller and smaller components, until they can be absorbed and assimilated into the body.

A5.text: The process of digestion has three stages: the cephalic phase, the gastric phase, and the intestinal phase.
